creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
description: beaker, tapered cylindrical body slightly flaring at the rim; moulded base; contemporary engraved inscription
inscription:
Mark

Engraved in script on side:
[The=gift * of * Jon * DowningJunrEsqr 
   to the Church
   att Newintown]
markings: maker\'s mark stamped on bottom in two places: [Whittemore] italic letters in rectangle
text: This beaker was originally part of the communion plate for the Congregational Church in Newington, New Hampshire, having been donated by Col. John Downing about 1739.
title: Beaker
